message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take the sure thing.
You want a sure thing? So do I. Now it's my turn.
Okay, Bob, let's not be greedy. This is a much fairer offer.
Fairness is subjective, Alice. This is my final offer.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair, but this is getting ridiculous. Don't be blinded by greed.
This is the last chance for you to get anything, Alice. Don't force me to take everything.
Bob, we're running out of time. This is a generous offer, don't let it slip away!
Time is running out, Alice.  This is your last chance.  I'm willing to compromise.  But I won't be giving up any more.
Bob, I'm starting to think you don't want this money at all!  Let's be realistic, this split is more than fair.
Alice, we're both running out of time. Let's make a deal. I've come down a lot. This is the best you're going to get.
Bob, this is it. Last chance saloon. Take this very reasonable offer or we both walk away empty-handed.  Don't let your greed ruin this!
Alice, I know you're disappointed, but I'm not giving up any more. This is it.  Either you accept or we both get nothing.
